summary:
I take pride in understanding business problems and solving them by entrusting them with my knowledge and experience of modern-day technology. I am a technical geek, a fierce engineering leader who believes in order to accomplish the vision, you have to live it.

To build a long-lasting software system, one must have the drive to first build and trust its teams. Passion drives the teams and the execution of the vision. I have enjoyed my growth being a software engineer, technical lead, and director. My personal and professional experiences have taught me the following about myself:

I can successfully develop and optimize software systems that are highly available, scalable, and fully automated.

- I put the customers' problems at the center of the design strategy.
- I can execute big ideas with ease and under constraints.
- I collect adequate data and research to target key problems that can lead to saving time and serving 
   easy and long-lasting solutions.

I can align, lead, grow and build small to large teams.

- Understanding the problem and solving it, comes to me from my gut. However, helping my team 
  understand the problem and getting them through it, is what gives me greater joy.
- I speak tech and exec.
- I motivate my people to perform better for the project and for themselves.

I educate, refine and drive myself to be a better person.

- I am constantly learning.
- I am calm and composed and I know how to work in adversity.
- I focus on making high-quality decisions that serve the company and the people I associate myself with.

I enjoy meeting new people and hearing new perspectives. Reach out if you want to talk to me about emerging tech, creating software systems, or politics.

Professional Skills
Data | AI & ML | Java | C/C++ | Rust | JavaScript | noSQL | Kubernetes | Data Scalability | Automation | Platform Scalability | Data Lake | Cloud Migration | AWS Cloud | Team Building | Mentoring | MLOps | MLFlow | Kotlin | Python | Data Warehouse

Domain Knowledge
Enterprise Software | Enterprise Architecture | Digital Marketing | Startup Management | Small Business | SaS | IaS | PaS
headline: Engineering Leader | Sr. Director | Chief Architect | Technical Leader | Engineering Idea To Realization | Visionary

educations.schoolName: Institute of Management Education Research and Training
Prestige Institute of Management Education and Research

position.title: Chief Architect & Engineering Leader
position.description:
• Built Engineering Org.
• Building Maritime Domain Awareness system - Track vessels in near real time
• Monitor & Alert in near real time on illegal or suspicious activities
• AI/ML & Pattern Detection++

position.title: Engineering and Technical Leader
position.description:
• Startups: TalkDesk, CS DISCO, Senslytic, Raddy
• Organizational Leadership: Spearheaded the creation of the entire organization structure, overseeing hiring processes globally and implementing agile methodologies to enhance project execution efficiency.
• Strategic Initiatives: Drove initiatives to leverage LLM for future growth, integrated AI Model, Experimentation, MLFLow, Prompt Engineering, Vector Database and more..
• Strategic Collaboration: Orchestrated collaborative efforts across the organization, successfully driving the execution of multiple high-profile projects.
• Technical Expertise: Provided architecture guidance for diverse projects, including streaming, applications, scaling, data, and databases, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.
• Infrastructure Design: Led the design of infrastructure components such as EKS (Kubernetes), CI/CD, Monitoring, Log Processing, Security, ECS, Fargate, and AWS, contributing to seamless operations and heightened system reliability
• Data Management and AI: Formulated and implemented data modeling strategies, offering expert guidance on database-related matters. Successfully developed and launched a full-stack AI service, resulting in a notable 30% increase in user engagement and acquisition.
• Data Governance and Automation: Championed data governance initiatives, including data processing, security, and daily data migration involving 4 PB of data, utilizing Alation. Automated PII detection, workflows, and data schema management, ensuring a secure and streamlined data environment.
• Innovation and Growth: Designed and implemented an Orchestration Engine, reducing operational costs by 40% and processing 30,000 events per second with real-time data, rule application, and backend ML.
• Led the development of high-performance ML, analytics, and data platforms, processing 30K events per second with a dataset size of 2 PB. These initiatives generated data-driven insights, resulting in a substantial 25% revenue growth.

position.title: Senior Director Of Engineering & Architecture
position.description:
• Founding Leadership: Spearheaded the establishment of Talkdesk's AI business unit, demonstrating visionary leadership in conceptualization, implementation, and success.
• Team Building and Leadership: Orchestrated the recruitment of a highly skilled team, set strategic goals, and provided decisive leadership, resulting in the successful execution of the AI business unit's objectives.
• Innovative AI Platform: Engineered an advanced AI and analytical platform, delivering valuable insights that significantly contributed to Talkdesk's overall company growth.
• Technological Proficiency: Demonstrated expertise in utilizing cutting-edge technologies, including Databricks, Data Lake, EKS, AWS, Linux, Java, and Scala. Leveraged this proficiency to develop innovative solutions and achieve tangible outcomes for the organization.

position.title: Director Of Architecture & Engineering
position.description:
• Strategic Team Restructuring: Played a pivotal role in the strategic restructuring and rebuilding of teams, fostering a more dynamic and efficient organizational structure.
• Cultural Transformation: Successfully initiated and implemented a cultural shift within the organization, fostering an environment conducive to innovation and collaboration.
• Leadership at Sony Interactive Entertainment: Established and led a billion-dollar engineering organization at Sony Interactive Entertainment, driving transformative initiatives that significantly contributed to company-wide growth and impact.
• Scalability Achievement: Enabled PlayStation to scale up to 200K concurrent transactions through impactful transformation efforts spanning the entire organization and its business units.
• Data Management Expertise: Played a key role in the implementation of Data Architecture, Data Lakes, and Data Governance, contributing to enhanced data management practices within the organization.

position.title: Software Architect
position.description:
• Architectural Modernization at Intuit: Led the modernization of Intuit's architecture by orchestrating the transition from C++ to Java and implementing efficient asynchronous processing with queues.
• Successful AWS Migration: Successfully migrated key components of Intuit to AWS, establishing a secure and scalable architecture aligned with industry best practices.
• Adoption of Cassandra: Pioneered the adoption of Cassandra within the organization, introducing a robust and scalable database solution to enhance overall system performance.
• Data Platform and Services Development: Engineered a robust Data and Services Platform capable of seamlessly handling millions of tax files and facilitating 10K concurrent transactions, contributing to enhanced efficiency and scalability.
• Cost Optimization and Reduction: Achieved a significant 15% reduction in data center costs, demonstrating a keen focus on operational efficiency and fiscal responsibility.

position.title: Technical Lead
position.description: Leading the development team to build an e-commerce system
